caller_intent: The caller (Jamie Flippin) aims to finalize a new homeowners policy with SafeCo for Nicole Thomas, using existing mortgage information and addressing a note about a dog.
resolution_steps: Confirmed the client's intent to proceed with the SafeCo policy.
Used existing mortgage information from Pinnacle Loan Services LLC.
Noted the client's mention of a dog and confirmed SafeCo allows pets.
Scheduled the policy to issue effective August 6.
Planned to send electronic paperwork for signature.
systems_referenced: Pinnacle Loan Services LLC mortgage records
summary: Jamie Flippin from Alliance Insurance is finalizing a SafeCo homeowners policy for Nicole Thomas, using existing mortgage data and addressing a pet note. The policy will issue on August 6 with electronic paperwork sent for signature. Jamie requests a callback for any remaining questions.
